name: BobBuyback

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: ERC20
SafeERC20
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
attributes.name: Destructible

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
attributes.name: destroy

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause
Claimable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
attributes.name: onlyPendingOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
attributes.name: claimOwnership
HasNoContracts

attributes.documentation:
@dev Reclaim ownership of Ownable contracts
@param _contractAddr The address of the Ownable to be reclaimed.
attributes.name: reclaimContract
CanReclaimToken

attributes.documentation:
@dev Reclaim all ERC20 compatible tokens
@param _token ERC20 The address of the token contract
attributes.name: reclaimToken

attributes.documentation: Automated buy back BOB tokens
attributes.name: BobBuyback
buyback

attributes.documentation:
@notice Calculates how much ETH somebody can receive for selling amount BOB
@param amount How much tokens to sell
attributes.name: calcReward

attributes.documentation: @notice Calculates how much BOB tokens this contract can buy (during current buyback round)
attributes.name: calcTokensAvailableToBuyback

attributes.documentation: @notice Checks if Buyback round is running
attributes.name: isRunning
setup
startBuyback

attributes.documentation: @notice Claim all BOB tokens stored on the contract and send them to owner
attributes.name: claimTokens
claimTokens

attributes.documentation: @notice Transfer all Ether held by the contract to the owner.
attributes.name: reclaimEther
